data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Saint Mary.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Mary, Jamaica
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Saint Mary, Jamaica.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Saint Mary, Jamaica. Please, stir the 34,242 believers here to pray for awakening.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Saint Mary. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Annotto Bay
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Annotto Bay, Saint Mary, Jamaica.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Saint Mary to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Saint Mary, Jamaica so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Saint Mary.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

location.name: Saint Mary
location.cities_list: Port Maria, Annotto Bay, Oracabessa, Islington
location.cities_list_w_pop: Port Maria (7,906), Annotto Bay (5,504), Oracabessa (4,100), Islington (2,958)
